titleStmt.title: The right government of thoughts, or, A discovery of all vain, unprofitable, idle, and wicked thoughts with directions for the getting, keeping, and governing of good thoughts, digested into chapters for the ease of the reader : whereunto are added four sermons / by ... John Angel ...
titleStmt.author: Angel, John, d. 1655.
T. B.

notesStmt.note: "Four sermons, ..." by John Angell has half title.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
